price: 14. Korosey too digaalay Yalli addunyal siinih yiysissike tammoysa, diggah koros akeeral girâ digaala-le.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمۡ فَذُوقُوهُ وَأَنَّ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālikum fadhūqūhu wa-anna lil'kāfirīna ʿadhāba al-nāri
